nodes.text: Splledarks were creatures that could be found on Endor, a forested moon orbiting the planet of the same name. The native Ewoks hunted splledarks for their meat and commonly ate them spit-roasted.

The splledarks were mentioned in the 2015 young readers novel Return of the Jedi: Beware the Power of the Dark Side!—a retelling of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi—written by Tom Angleberger.
